short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Giistr is the ultimate solution to instantly create unique summaries of any text just by highlighting it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Giistr gives you the power to quickly and easily highlight text and get a summary instantly within seconds. 

No more wasting time scrolling through pages of text and trying to make sense of it all. With Giistr, you can get the gist of any text quickly and accurately.

This revolutionary summarizing tool will save you time and energy. It quickly scans through the text and extracts only the necessary information for you. 

This way, you don't have to read through endless paragraphs and pages of text to get the gist of what's being said.

Giistr is the perfect solution for busy professionals, students, and anyone who needs to quickly and accurately summarize any text.

You can rely on it to save time and energy while keeping you informed on the essential points of a text. So, why wait? Get Giistr now and start summarizing!

Once Installed simply highlight any content, right click and you will notice an action "Summarize", select this and a pop-up will show.

With Giistr you can summaries up to 3 times per day with a limit of up to 2,500 words per summary.
